items.title: WATCH:  Flash floods destroy homes and wash away roads in West Virginia
items.description: There is a state of emergency in West Virgina where at least three people are dead and several missing from flash flooding Saturday night.

items.title: Minnesota lawmakers shooting suspect Vance Boelter due in court Monday
items.description: Vance Boelter, the man suspected of a fatal shooting that targeted lawmakers in Minnesota, is expected to appear on Monday in a Minneapolis court.

items.title: WATCH:  Trump announced presidential run 10 years ago today
items.description: In 2015, Donald Trump was the 12th Republican to announce his candidacy after descending a golden escalator at Trump Tower in New York.

items.title: The lawmaker shootings in Minnesota are a disturbing trend: Analysis
items.description: The recent shootings of lawmakers in Minnesota are part of a disturbing trend toward politically linked violence, ABC News analysts say.

items.title: WATCH:  Hammerhead shark falls from sky onto South Carolina disc golf course
items.description: A group of disc golfers witnessed a baby hammerhead shark fall from the sky while in the middle of a game on the morning of May 18 in Myrtle Beach, So...
